channel.title: [PI] How to add a shop that buys anything?
channel.description:
Hi,
I was wondering if you can remove objects on PI. I'm at a place with crates and stuff and I want to remove them so I have some flat room. I know that you can add stuff like banks, mining rocks, etc. in ObjectManager.java but those crates and stuff are not listed there, so where can I find those? Is it even possible to delete them?
Thnx in advance.

item.title: [PI] How to add a shop that buys anything?
item.dc:creator: @RiiPiiNFtW RiiPiiNFtW
item.description:
@RiiPiiNFtW wrote:

In shops.cfg, after the Shop name, there are usually two 2’s. Just make them 1’s i assume.

Read full topic
item.source: [PI] How to add a shop that buys anything?

item.title: [PI] How to add a shop that buys anything?
item.dc:creator: @jman3177 jman3177
item.description:
@jman3177 wrote:

Theres items that can’t be sold just remove them from that list and sell them to the general store and problem solved

Read full topic
item.source: [PI] How to add a shop that buys anything?

item.title: [PI] How to add a shop that buys anything?
item.dc:creator: @Resent Resent
item.description:
@Resent wrote:

Try objecthandler.java or objectassistant.java. If you don’t know the object ID, just stand next to it and find the coords and match it up in the Java file.

Read full topic
item.source: [PI] How to add a shop that buys anything?
